SELECT A.HAN_NM, A.RESN_REGN_NUM, A.DPOB_CD, A.SYSTEMKEY ,C.HUS_FNDTN_ADDR ||' '|| C.HUS_DTL_PATR_ADDR AS ADDR ,FCBASS0400CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_CD ,FCBASS0400CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD ,FCBASS0500CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(A.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) ,A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.BUSIN_CD ) AS BUSIN_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_CD ,FCBASS0350CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.TYP_OCCU_CD, A.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1') AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ,A.RETRY_REAS_CTNT FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0111 C WHERE A.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD(+) AND A.SYSTEMKEY = C.SYSTEMKEY(+)
AND A.HAN_NM = #hanNm#
AND A.RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','')
ORDER BY EMYMT_BGNN_DT DESC

SELECT B.DPOB_CD, B.SYSTEMKEY, B.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT),8,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,'yyyymmdd'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT) AS EMYMT_BGNN_DT ,DECODE(LENGTH(B.EMYMT_END_DT),8,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.EMYMT_END_DT,'yyyymmdd'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),B.EMYMT_END_DT) AS EMYMT_END_DT ,FCBASS0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD,B.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS CHILD_EMYMT_DIV_CD ,FCBASS0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.DEPT_CD, '2') AS CHILD_DEPT_CD ,FCBASS0500CDNM(B.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) ,B.DEPT_CD, B.BUSIN_CD ) AS CHILD_BUSIN_CD ,FCBASS0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD,B.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS CHILD_TYP_OCCU_CD ,FCBASS0350CDNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, '1') AS CHILD_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD FROM PSNL0110 B WHERE B.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND B.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# ORDER BY B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') || SUBSTR(#certcDivCd#,-2)|| LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PRF_ISS_NUM,LENGTH(PRF_ISS_NUM)-3,4)),0)+1 ,4,'0') FROM PSNL0550 WHERE SUBSTR(PRF_ISS_NUM,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') AND CERTC_DIV_CD = #certcDivCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0550 (DPOB_CD, PRF_ISS_NUM, CERTC_DIV_CD, SYSTEMKEY, CERTC_ISS_DT, ISS_NUM_CPIS, ISS_PRPSE_CTNT, ISS_ISTUT_NM, RETRY_REAS_CTNT, ISS_APPY_DT, ISS_APPBN_DT, ISS_CODTN_DIV_CD, ISS_CODTN_EMP_NUM, ISS_YN, CERTC_ISS_DEL_YN, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) VALUES (#dpobCd#, #prfIssNum#, #certcDivCd#, #systemkey#, #certcIssDt#, #issNumCpis#, #issPrpseCtnt#, #issIstutNm#, #retryReasCtnt#, #issAppyDt#, #issAppbnDt#, #issCodtnDivCd#, #issCodtnEmpNum#, #issYn#, #certcIssDelYn#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr#)
